data.message: #IChooseSunday This would be a dream to take my best friend as it's her 18th!! She deserves it and would be amazing for us to go!!!! The chance to see all these amazing acts especially Louisa Johnson and Shaun Mendes!! It would honestly be a dream to get the chance to experience #CapitalJBB!💓😍🎶 #HolidaysAreComing

replies.message: Riana Davis-Martine Thanks for entering our #CapitalJBB comp! Here’s a message for you #HolidaysAreComing https://www.facebook.com/1545297492377124/videos/1787634174810120
